original_text: It was me who decided the size of the world. You surely must know that! I measured it as I made it. It was me who decided the size of the world.
korean_text: 누가 그것의 도량법을 정하였는지, 누가 그 줄을 그것의 위에 띄웠는지 네가 아느냐

sentences.original_text: It was me who decided the size of the world
I measured it as I made it
It was me who decided the size of the world
